latestUpdates.data: Senior Citizens / Physically challenged quota for July-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f. 23.04.2025, 3:00 PM. Please [Click Here](/pld/slot-booking?flow=pld&flowIdentifier=pld)
Special Entry Darshan (Rs.300) tickets for July-2025  will be available for booking w.e.f. 24.04.2025, 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](/slot-booking?flow=sed&flowIdentifier=sed)
Tirumala and Tirupati Accommodation Quota for July-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f. 24.04.2025, 03:00 PM. Please [Click Here](/accommodation/instructions?flow=acc&flowIdentifier=acc)
Darshan & Accommodation Quota to the SRIVANI Trust (Rs. 10,000/-) donors for the month of JULY – 2025 will be available for booking w.e.f 23.04.2025 from 11:00 AM onwards.
Tirumala Angapradakshinam tokens for July-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f. 23.04.2025, 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](/apd/slot-booking?flow=apd&flowIdentifier=apd)

Srivari Arjitha Seva tickets quota for the Sevas like Kalyanam, Unjal Seva, Arjitha Brahmotsavam, and Sahasra Deepalankara Seva for July-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f. 22.04.2025, 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](
/arjitha-seva/slot-booking?section=pilgrim-details&flowIdentifier=arjitha-seva&flow=arjitha-seva)

Total number of Seva E - Dip Registrations received for July-2025 Srivari Arjitha Sevas :
- Thomalaseva: **382683**
- Archana: **377815**
- Astadala Pada Padmaradhana: **364108**
- Suprabhatham: **417067**
For Selected List [Click here](https://ttdevasthanams.ap.gov.in/misc/images/v4/2025_04_21_EDIP_SELECTIONS.pdf)

The Online Seva (Virtual participation) and connected Darshan quota for Kalyanothsavam, Unjal Seva, Arjitha Brahmotsavam & Sahasra Deepalankara Sevas of Srivari Temple, Tirumala for July-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f. 22.04.2025, 3:00 PM. Please [Click Here](/virtual-seva/seva-instructions?templeName=Srivari%20Temple&flowIdentifier=virtual-seva&flow=virtual-seva)

Angapradakshinam Seva tickets eDip registrations for Tirupati (Urban and Rural) and Tirumala locals (only) for 26.04.2025 (Saturday) will be available between 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. on 24.04.2025. Please [Click Here](/agp/dashboard?flow=agp&flowIdentifier=agp)

Sri Padmavathi Ammavari Temple, Tiruchanoor Special Entry Darshan (Rs. 200/-) tickets for May-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f, 24.04.2025, 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](/spat/slot-booking?flow=spat&flowIdentifier=spat)

TTD - Local Temples Seva Quota for May-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f 25.04.2025 at 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](/arjitha-seva/slot-booking?section=pilgrim-details&flowIdentifier=arjitha-seva&templeName=Sri%20Padmavathi%20Ammavari%20Temple&sevaName=All)

Sri Srinivasa Divyanugraha Visesha Homam at Saptha Gau Pradhakshina shala, Alipiri Tickets for the month of May-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f. 25.04.2025, 10.00 AM. Please [Click Here](/arjitha-seva/slot-booking?section=pilgrim-details&flowIdentifier=arjitha-seva&templeName=Sapthagiri%20Gau%20Pradakshina%20Shala&sevaName=Sri%20Srinivasa%20Divyaanugraha%20Homam)
Darshan & Accommodation Quota to the Trusts/Schemes Donors for the month of JUNE–2025 will be available for booking w.e.f 26. 03. 2025 from 11:30 AM onwards
To generate Digital passbook for the donations made before September 2016, please [click here](https://tirupatibalaji.ap.gov.in/#/donorPassbook)

The Advance booking Arjitha Seva ticket holders of Sahasrakalasabhishekam, Vishesha Pooja, Nijapada darshanam are requested to avail Break Darshan or to get refund instead of Seva for their booking made in advance. Please [click here](https://arjithaseva.tirupatibalaji.ap.gov.in/#/) to avail break darshan or to get refund.
To enable self service for the existing    donors, please [Click here](https://tirupatibalaji.ap.gov.in/#/donorSelfservice)
